title: FINTECH
description: Fintech, or financial technology, refers to the technological innovation in the design and delivery of financial services and products.

title: HEALTH
description: Software Health indicates how your application complies with programming best practices that increase resiliency, improve agility and reduce complexity.

title: EDUCATION
description: software that is designed to be used primarily for a given function is referred to as a subject specific tool. A tool is any piece of software or utility that facilitates the development of applicant
